name: SkateboardFacts
0:
”Alexa ask Skateboard Facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa ask Skateboard Facts to give me a skateboard fact”
”Alexa ask Skateboard Facts to tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: skateboard facts
des: You probably already know that skateboarding is the coolest sport ever, but did you also know that the average tree that is used for the production of a skateboard is 60 to 80 years old and only the 2 to 8 meters of the bottom of these 30 meters trees is of the quality required to make a skateboard, or that the current world record holder for the most 360-degree spins is Richy Carrasco, who completed 142 consecutive spins. Expand your knowledge of all things related to skateboarding with Skateboard Facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
